English.firstNumberInput: What is your first number? (Only numbers will be accepted)
English.secondNumberInput: What is your second number? (Only numbers will be accepted)
English.operationInput:
What operation would you like to perform? (Only '1,2,3,4' inputs are accepted)
1) Add 2) Subtract 3) Multiply 4) Divide
English.askAgain:
Would you like to perform a calculation? (Only '1,2' inputs are accepted)
1) yes
2) no

German.operationInput:
Welche Operation möchten Sie durchführen?
1) Addition 2) Subtraktion 3) Multiplikation 4) Aufteilung
German.askAgain:
Möchten Sie eine Berechnung durchführen?
1) ja
2) nein
